citations.narrative:
The licensee obtained the following animals since the re-license inspection on 02/22/2022 and the follow-up inspection
conducted on 05/12/2022: 2 Goats, 2 Sheep, 2 Alpaca, and 3 Rabbits.
These species were not included on the license application. Currently, the number of animals present at the time of
inspection exceed the number of animals authorized for the license. The licensee decided to expand the business to
include farm animals and additional small exotic mammals.
Licenses authorize a specific number of animals and specific types of animals. The licensee must apply for a new license
and include any new species types and the greatest number of animals, per species type, that will be held at any given
time in a 3 year period.
Correct by March 6, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(2) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee obtained the following animals since the re-license inspection on 02/22/2022 and the follow-up inspection 
conducted on 05/12/2022:  2 Goats, 2 Sheep, 2 Alpaca, and 3 Rabbits. 
These species were not included on the license application. Currently, the number of animals present at the time of 
inspection exceed the number of animals authorized for the license. The licensee decided to expand the business to 
include farm animals and additional small exotic mammals.  
 
Licenses authorize a specific number of animals and specific types of animals. The licensee must apply for a new license 
and include any new species types and the greatest number of animals, per species type, that will be held at any given 
time in a 3 year period.  
 
Correct by March 6, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
